top_categories.workout_context: Gravel Rocks’s uk north york moors, british gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Gravel Rocks rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Gravel Rocks when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Racing Gravel Rocks isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Gravel Rocks. Make this intensity feel like home.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Gravel Rocks — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
The varied gradients at Gravel Rocks reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Gravel Rocks’s uk north york moors gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Gravel Rocks’s uk north york moors gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Gravel Rocks — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on uk north york moors gravel.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Gravel Rocks — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Cadence efficiency makes every pedal stroke at Gravel Rocks count — smooth technique reduces muscular fatigue over long distances.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Gravel Rocks’s 55 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Gravel Rocks requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on uk north york moors gravel to build confidence. Expect: uk north york moors, british gravel, uk.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, TT Threshold, and Over Under to prepare you for 55 miles of uk north york moors gravel in North York Moors, UK.
